LanguageData.ZP_BRBento.label: Bento(Millet)
LanguageData.ZP_BRBento.description: 【特産品】どこでも食べれるお弁当.\nThis single-portion meal has been packed with great attention and care. As is the nature of Bento, this meal can be eaten anywhere, allowing colonists to eat on the go without suffering a particular debuff.
LanguageData.ZP_WRBento.label: Bento
LanguageData.ZP_WRBento.description: 【特産品】どこでも食べれる白米のお弁当.\nThis single-portion meal has been packed with great attention and care. As is the nature of Bento, this meal can be eaten anywhere, allowing colonists to eat on the go without suffering a particular debuff.
LanguageData.ZP_BRTKG.label: 卵かけご飯(玄米)
LanguageData.ZP_BRTKG.description: ご飯のままでも美味しいのに生卵をのせるという悪魔の所業の一品。
LanguageData.ZP_WRTKG.label: 卵かけご飯
LanguageData.ZP_WRTKG.description: ご飯のままでも美味しいのに生卵をのせるという悪魔の所業の一品。
LanguageData.ZP_BRGyudon.label: 肉丼(玄米)
LanguageData.ZP_BRGyudon.description: ご飯の上にがっつり肉を盛り付けたどんぶり。
LanguageData.ZP_WRGyudon.label: 肉丼
LanguageData.ZP_WRGyudon.description: ご飯の上にがっつり肉を盛り付けた白米のどんぶり。
LanguageData.ZP_GRTakikomi.label: 炊き込みご飯
LanguageData.ZP_GRTakikomi.description: もち米と具を一緒に炊き込んで作るご飯。
LanguageData.ZP_NattoRice.label: NattoRice
LanguageData.ZP_NattoRice.description: ご飯の上に納豆を盛り付けたシンプルなどんぶり。
LanguageData.ZP_SalmonRiceBall.label: Salmon Onigiri
LanguageData.ZP_SalmonRiceBall.description: 【特産品】塩味のきいた鮭の入ったちょっと豪華なおにぎり。
LanguageData.ZP_TempuraRiceBall.label: Tenmusu
LanguageData.ZP_TempuraRiceBall.description: 【特産品】天ぷらの入ったちょっと豪華なおにぎり\n Onigiri
